metadata.title: CVE-2020-14404 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in LibVNCServer before 0.9.13. libvncserver/rre.c allows out-of-bounds access via encodings.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-14404` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvncclient1 - 0.9.13+dfsg-1
libvncserver1 - 0.9.13+dfsg-1
No subscription required

vino - 3.22.0-6ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvncserver package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.13+dfsg-1').
veyon package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
vino package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.22.0-6ubuntu2').
x11vnc package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
